title: The night-vvalker, or The little theife A comedy, as it vvas presented by her Majesties Servants, at the Private House in Drury Lane. Written by Iohn Fletcher. Gent.
author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for Andrew Crooke, and William Cooke,
notes: The title page is partly in the same setting as James Shirley's "The coronation a comedy", 1640 (STC 22440).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
